title: Add Call Now and WhatsApp contact buttons on the Contact section (9080250925)

requirements.text: Add prominent "Call Now" and "WhatsApp" contact buttons to the Contact section (section id "contact") using the phone number 9080250925, so visitors can contact NK SYSTECH directly as an alternative to email delivery.

quotes: need site inquires recieve by my mail

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays two clearly labeled buttons: "Call Now" and "WhatsApp".
"Call Now" uses a tel link to 9080250925 (href="tel:9080250925").

"WhatsApp" opens WhatsApp chat for 9080250925 using a wa.me link with the correct country code for India (https://wa.me/919080250925) and opens in a new tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").
Buttons are visible and usable on both mobile and desktop layouts and do not break the existing inquiry form submission flow.
All user-facing text on the buttons is in English.

requirements.text: Update the Contact section copy to clarify that visitors can either submit the inquiry form or contact directly via phone/WhatsApp, without changing other site sections.

quotes: need site inquires recieve by my mail

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section includes a short English line of helper text near the new buttons (or near the form) indicating direct contact options are available.
No references are added implying inquiries will be delivered to email automatically.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Sending inquiries to email (email delivery) or integrating any third-party email provider.
Adding WhatsApp API automation or real-time chat.
Changing the existing inquiry storage behavior in the backend.
